title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Well where is the good locations where is good vibe.I never went in new york but people who went there they say there is good vibe that people are interested to connect other humans and social.The second place could be maybe los Angeles or miami perhaps australia... But definately the Dubai can beat them all UAE customer service is one of the best you feel like you have some value you get treated by respect a lot.And all the happy people going to Dubai so you feel that happy vibe.Let's be honest Even If you are rich you want to see people around you happy and respectful and in your everyday life you want to think less about material things like money or wealth you just want to communicate with people who respect each others and feel good and vibrate the good vibe it's most bad experince to be surrounded with negative people pointless stress and depresions If the vibe in the air Are negative you feel that vibe instantly and you get sick and your own mindset turn to be same bad slowly as the ones you are surrounded with.So tell me what's your opinion ? In your experinces the locations to Travel or Even to be permanent resident where is the good vibe surrounded and you just feel life is miracle and it getting better and better. So what's your toughts on this ? Share your insights and experinces about good vibe locations and bad ones let's find those good vibe places.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on February 19, 2023, 09:07:47 AMWell where is the good locations where is good vibe.I never went in new york but people who went there they say there is good vibe that people are interested to connect other humans and social.The second place could be maybe los Angeles or miami perhaps australia... But definately the Dubai can beat them all UAE customer service is one of the best you feel like you have some value you get treated by respect a lot.And all the happy people going to Dubai so you feel that happy vibe.Let's be honest Even If you are rich you want to see people around you happy and respectful and in your everyday life you want to think less about material things like money or wealth you just want to communicate with people who respect each others and feel good and vibrate the good vibe it's most bad experince to be surrounded with negative people pointless stress and depresions If the vibe in the air Are negative you feel that vibe instantly and you get sick and your own mindset turn to be same bad slowly as the ones you are surrounded with.So tell me what's your opinion ? In your experinces the locations to Travel or Even to be permanent resident where is the good vibe surrounded and you just feel life is miracle and it getting better and better. So what's your toughts on this ? Share your insights and experinces about good vibe locations and bad ones let's find those good vibe places.If you want to get positive vibes get close to nature. I don't get the vibes I need in big cities where the air, sound, and almost everything are polluted. I prefer hearing the bird sing and the trees dance. Seeing the fish swim and the squirrel jump from tree to tree is cool. Humans can pretend to be nice but inside, they are filled with jealousy, pride, and all forms of evil. But nature is real and ever true. I am more comfortable in the presence of nature than all these man-made and artificial creations of men that give superficial pleasure. You can also find positive vibes around children. Their innocence will teach you forgiveness. Children can never betray you. If you want positive vibes, you don't necessarily need to get them from others or in big cities, you can also create them. Just be positive and selfless and you will attract the vibes.

comments.author: Fullbear2222

Just be positive and selfless and you will attract the vibes.Good vibe are Also the good and respectful customer service.You as customer can feel can sense If the other person hate inside you and the job but making just the fake nice smile imagine you eat food that is made by hate all those bad emotions Are in your food.My experince are good i can say best vibe customer service with UAE Dubai emirates flight company just try this you are like in the faieytale world .Also people say that in moscow there is Also very very good english speaking customer service.I dont say wich one but scandinavian countries the customer service specially one country customer service mindset is '"good you here better you If you go away " Im " Im too lazy to deal with you anyways" " it's okay i can make my fake smile to you " I could say in Dubai i never felt any mean attitude from the customer service it's Like a miracle to be there as customer you feel respect.Also my friend use to Travel to new York Brooklyn italy location of city and can say only good about italians the food places it's just pleasure how good are italy food places they treat you with high respect without fake attitude. We as humans need good vibe it's Like food what's feed our minds with good energy.Visit those good vibe places and you feel instant good.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Church. Why? It reminds me that I have eternal life in Jesus. And this is something that takes all fear away.Sure, my body still cowers somewhat at the thought of dying. It's a natural feeling. But it goes away a whole lot when I remember that Jesus will revive my dead body sometime, and that He will convert it into super-health, that lives forever in eternal joy.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on February 19, 2023, 06:07:31 PMChurch. Why? It reminds me that I have eternal life in Jesus. And this is something that takes all fear away.Sure, my body still cowers somewhat at the thought of dying. It's a natural feeling. But it goes away a whole lot when I remember that Jesus will revive my dead body sometime, and that He will convert it into super-health, that lives forever in eternal joy.Thank you for this great reminder, sir. But If it is the church that makes you feel you have eternal life in Christ, then that is not too good sir. That means without the church you don't have such consciousness of life after death. The church is just a building but our body isÂ  the real temple. Even without the church, we should always be with the Holy Spirit that constantly reminds us that this mortal body is grass and dust. We must frequently go to the Bible and not the church building because it is personal studies that build our spiritual life more than congregational gatherings.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on February 19, 2023, 06:07:31 PMChurch. Why? It reminds me that I have eternal life in Jesus. And this is something that takes all fear away.Sure, my body still cowers somewhat at the thought of dying. It's a natural feeling. But it goes away a whole lot when I remember that Jesus will revive my dead body sometime, and that He will convert it into super-health, that lives forever in eternal joy.You are a spirit having a soul in a body, instead of thinking of the death as something bad, see it as a transitioning and leaving of your body behind for your soul to start another journey. The thought of not seeing anyone you know anymore is scary, but there is life after death.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Die_empty on February 19, 2023, 11:18:50 AMIf you want to get positive vibes get close to nature. I don't get the vibes I need in big cities where the air, sound, and almost everything are polluted. I prefer hearing the bird sing and the trees dance.You're on point with your view and choice of preference, having the state of things in their natural occurrence is the best, having the entire environment being calm and well saturated with peace is enough to derive once satisfaction needed to think and release stress about life entirely, we sometimes needed a calm environment that could help us get concentrated on particular aspect we need no distractions on.Quote from: Die_empty on February 19, 2023, 11:18:50 AMYou can also find positive vibes around children.Because children has no grudge or worries in their mind, they think about nothing and act directly as things are or appears to them, everyone want to be like the little children without blemish, they know all their needs were taken care of without bothering to know how.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on February 23, 2023, 07:57:10 PMQuote from: BADecker on February 19, 2023, 06:07:31 PMChurch. Why? It reminds me that I have eternal life in Jesus. And this is something that takes all fear away.Sure, my body still cowers somewhat at the thought of dying. It's a natural feeling. But it goes away a whole lot when I remember that Jesus will revive my dead body sometime, and that He will convert it into super-health, that lives forever in eternal joy.You are a spirit having a soul in a body, instead of thinking of the death as something bad, see it as a transitioning and leaving of your body behind for your soul to start another journey. The thought of not seeing anyone you know anymore is scary, but there is life after death. Good idea, since you really don't have any choice. Might as well make the best of it with good vibes. It's kinda like knowing that there is a God. James (in the Bible) says that even demons know this, and tremble in fear.
